suggest.php: >=7.0.0 (this package performs significantly better with PHP >= 7.0.0 than it does with previous versions).
suggest.maikuolan/phpmussel-plugin-notifications: A phpMussel plugin to receive email notifications from phpMussel whenever a file upload is blocked.
suggest.maikuolan/cidram: Classless Inter-Domain Routing Access Manager (works great in conjunction with phpMussel).
